text:
The @NPF #COVID19 Task Force just approved two new recommendations for patients with #psoriatic disease. 
1. Get the #mRNA #vaccine ASAP.
2. Continue systemic #psoriasis or #psoriatic #arthritis treatment during vaccination.  
@AADmember #Epitwitter #Dermtwitter #biologics https://t.co/pFARMVAGYi
